summary: Iteration 90: Gmail Real-time Background Polling feature fully tested. Backend: 11/11 tests passed - polling/status returns poller_running=true with last_auto_scan timestamp, settings shows polling_mode=realtime with interval=5 min, PUT settings with polling_mode=manual stops poller, PUT settings with polling_mode=realtime restarts poller. E2E: POST /pending creates item with Monday.com sync, PUT /pending/{id}/approve and /reject update Monday.com status. Frontend: All 5 tabs accessible (Pending Queue, Email Rules, Settings, Processing Log, Monday.com Config), Settings tab shows 'Background scanner active' with green indicator, Real-time mode selected, interval input visible, Save Settings works. Comunidad section shows Feed Visibility Controls for admin.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/polling/status returns poller_running=true
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/polling/status returns last_auto_scan timestamp
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/settings shows polling_mode=realtime
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/settings shows polling_interval_minutes=5
Backend: PUT /api/wallet-topups/settings with polling_mode=manual stops poller
Backend: PUT /api/wallet-topups/settings with polling_mode=realtime restarts poller
Backend: POST /api/wallet-topups/pending creates item and syncs to Monday.com
Backend: PUT /api/wallet-topups/pending/{id}/approve updates Monday.com status
Backend: PUT /api/wallet-topups/pending/{id}/reject updates Monday.com status
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/monday/config returns board configuration
Backend: POST /api/wallet-topups/monday/test verifies connection
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/gmail/status returns connection status
Backend: GET /api/wallet-topups/gmail/processed returns processing log
Backend Logs: '[GmailPoller] Background polling started' at startup confirmed
Frontend: All 5 tabs accessible (Pending Queue, Email Rules, Settings, Processing Log, Monday.com Config)
Frontend: Settings tab shows 'Background scanner active' with green indicator
Frontend: Real-time mode option visible and selected
Frontend: Polling interval input shows value=5
Frontend: Save Settings button works and shows success toast 'Settings saved'
Frontend: Comunidad section shows Feed Visibility panel for admin with 'All Users' mode
Frontend: Monday.com Config tab shows board 18399959471 (Recharge Approval) configured
Frontend: Monday.com Config tab shows column mappings (Amount, Sender Name, Status, Warning, Bank Reference)
seed_data_creation: Created 3 TEST_ prefixed pending topups for E2E testing (TEST_Gmail_Poller_Test, TEST_Approve_Flow, TEST_Reject_Flow)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 90 tested Gmail Background Polling feature. Navigation: Panel Admin -> Alertas de Pago -> Configuracion tab. The poller auto-starts on server startup when polling_mode=realtime and gmail_connected=true. Backend logs show '[GmailPoller] Background polling started'. Settings tab displays 'Background scanner active' with green dot indicator. Current config: polling_mode=realtime, interval=5 min, Gmail connected to toolskoh@gmail.com. Monday.com Board ID 18399959471 (Recharge Approval) is configured with column mappings. Comunidad Feed Visibility panel visible for admin users.
